titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at St. Mary Whitechappel on the second of December, 1697 being the day of thanksgiving for the peace / by Richard Welton, rector of the said parish.
titleStmt.author: Welton, R. (Richard), 1671?-1726.

notesStmt.note: "Publish'd at the request of the parishioners."
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
